policy: GCP Kubernetes Engine Clusters have Network policy disabled
rule: $.resource[*].google_container_cluster exists and ($.resource[*].google_container_cluster.*[*].*.addons_config does not exist or $.resource[*].google_container_cluster.*[*].*.addons_config[*].network_policy_config does not exist or $.resource[*].google_container_cluster.*[*].*.addons_config[*].network_policy_config[*] is empty or ($.resource[*].google_container_cluster.*[*].*.addons_config[*].network_policy_config[*] is not empty and $.resource[*].google_container_cluster.*[*].*.addons_config[*].network_policy_config[*].disabled any equal true))
